useCase.name: Player Input and Confirmation

preconditions.precondition: User has launched the game application.

successEndConditions.condition: Players have successfully input their names and confirmed.

useCase.trigger: User clicks on the 'Comenzar' button to start the game.

mainSequence.step: StartButtonEventHandler handles the event and sets visibility.
PlayersInputScreen is displayed for input selection.
ConfirmButton handles the event and requests data selection.
Game receives and loads the data.
User inputs and confirms player names.
NamesButton handles the event and executes.
Player objects are created and added to the game.
QuestionScreen shows questions for each player.
